actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to direct the President to halt all exports of gasoline, distillate fuel oil, propane gas, and residual fuel until he determines that no shortage of such fuel exists in the United States.

summary.text: Directs the President to halt all exports of gasoline, distillate fuel oil, propane gas, and residual fuel until he determines that no shortage of such fuel exists in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to direct the President to halt all exports of gasoline, distillate fuel oil, propane gas, and residual fuel until he determines that no shortage of such fuel exists in the United States.
